column1: THOUGH it has been more than 30 years since Jim Chilchutt last cut a rug at a high - school dance, he recaptures his lost youth every weekend, cruising the streets of Ventura behind the wheel of a 1948 Studebaker.

column1: Still criminally ignored here in the Blighty, The Mekons prove that early 30s with a penchant for late nights and beer can still cut a rug with contemporary sounds.
